item.description:
Ken Sharples, a member of Seacoast Liberty, is the state coordinator for the subject event.

Second Amendment March is a national event to take place in April, 2010 in Washington, D.C. and other cities across America. The purpose is to remind the U.S. Government that it is our right to keep and bear arms, and that right shall not be infringed.

As more information is available for this event, I will update this meeting. For further information on this event in NH and other cities, please check out the website at: http://www.secondamen...

Additional Details can also be found here:
http://forum.nhlibert...
item.name: Second Amendment March
